nonawakening.trick: Dash, Fiery Rage, Triumphant Shout, Fearsome Shout, Inescapable Doom are all skills that you can animation cancel with Raze, Flatten, (new) Cyclone

Dash > Raze really fast, gives you effect of glyph of dash (Flurry of blows I) without putting Dash on cooldown. I assume it works like reload works on gunner for triple barrage. While executing this keep in mind getting the effect Flurry of Blows I has 50% chance and not 100%
Do not use glyph that eliminates Thunderstrike Slow restriction, because it exists as a glyph, but the slow no longer exists on Thunderstrike (Tip given by Kura)
In situations where you somehow Overwhelm > into Cyclone you do not need to Block in between (cancel animation)

If you charge cyclone from the front of the boss and somehow do not manage to go to the boss' back do not cancel it, cast it. Cyclone damage on front is slightly less when crit than from behind. (Due to Zerk passive). Only if evasive smash is on cooldown.
You can use gunner bot, mystic totem and thrall of life to reduce the cooldown of Unleash since they proc bloodshed.
if Lethal strike is chained from Thunderstrike, Cyclone or Vampiric Blow it gets 50% increased damage

awakening.trick: Awakening skill chains (none of these are mentioned on the skills) Right click is your cancel animation to every skill from awakening mode except skill number 1 (Rampage)
Left click is a mini dash when used without any other skill before or after (u can spam left click only to dash out of places u can't iframe)
Rampage (skill number 1) chains only with Beast Fury (skill number 2)
Right Click chains with Left click only
Beast Fury interrupts any skill and casts itself.
During awakening you have only one iframe Unbreakable (for attacks coming to you which you can't walk out of)
When you are hitting multiple targets on awakening skills Right, Left click / Rampage get their stacks faster
if near -90% hp and you think your healer can't save you. Use Unbreakable it will make your hp 1 and healer will have higher chances of saving you from dying.
Right click [ Max stacks : 9 / What it does : Higher damage of skill 1 (Rampage) ]
Left click [ Max stacks : 5 / What it does : Higher attack speed of skill number 1 (Rampage) ]
Rampage (skill number 1) [ Max stacks : 10 / What it does : Higher damage of skill number 2 (Beast fury) ]
